value.title: Brain-machine interface helped a man with paralysis feed himself using robotic arms
value.excerpt: People with arm paralysis might easily feed themselves in the future.  University-led researchers have developed a new technique that let a partially paralyzed man feed himself using robotic arms connected through a brain-machine interface.

value.title: Robots become racist and sexist when programmed with common AI system, researchers claim
